articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: India vs South Africa: Why Rinku Singh said 'sorry' after the 2nd T20I - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Cricket News: India suffered a loss in the rain-affected second T20I against South Africa. Despite the defeat, Rinku Singh further enhanced his emerging reputation
articles.content: 2nd T20I: South Africa beat India, take 1-0 lead in the series
